testCases.title: End-to-End Happy Path: Search for Help Topic and View Results
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search bar is visible.

steps.expected: Xbox Support home page loads with search bar displaying 'Hi, how can we help?' placeholder
Text appears in search box; auto-complete suggestions appear (up to 6 suggestions)

steps.action: Click on a suggested search result (e.g., 'controller warranty')
steps.expected: User is redirected to search results page with URL containing the search phrase
Page displays 'Search results' heading, result count, and relevant article cards with titles and descriptions

steps.action: Click on a search result article
steps.expected: User is navigated to the article page with relevant content

testCases.title: Search Submission Using Enter Key
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search bar is visible.

steps.action: Type 'game pass' in the search box

steps.expected: User is redirected to search results page with results for 'game pass'

testCases.title: Search Submission Using Search Button
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search bar is visible.

steps.expected: Text appears in search box and Search button is visible
User is redirected to search results page with results for 'subscription'

testCases.title: Auto-Complete Suggestions Display
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search bar is visible.

steps.expected: Auto-complete dropdown appears with up to 6 relevant suggestions
Each suggestion is displayed as a button with search icon and descriptive text

testCases.title: Clear Button Functionality
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search bar is visible.

steps.action: Type 'test query' in the search box
steps.expected: Text appears in search box and Clear button (X) appears
Search box is cleared and Clear button disappears

testCases.title: Search Results Page - Load More Functionality
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search returns more than 10 results.

steps.action: Type 'controller' in the search box and press Enter
steps.expected: Search results page loads with multiple results

steps.action: Scroll down to the bottom of the results

steps.expected: Additional search results are loaded and displayed below existing results

testCases.title: Empty Search Submission
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search bar is visible.

steps.action: Press Enter key without entering any text
steps.expected: No search is performed; user remains on home page or receives validation message

testCases.title: Search with Special Characters
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search bar is visible.

steps.action: Type special characters like '@#$%^&*' in the search box
steps.expected: Characters are accepted in the search box
Search is performed; results page shows appropriate message (no results or filtered results)

testCases.title: Search with No Matching Results
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search bar is visible.

steps.action: Type a random string that would not match any content (e.g., 'xyzabc123nonexistent')

steps.expected: Search results page loads with zero results or 'No results found' message

testCases.title: Search Persistence on Results Page
testCases.assumptions: User is on search results page.

steps.action: Type 'billing' in the search box and press Enter
Verify search box on results page
steps.expected: Search box on results page displays the original search term 'billing'

steps.action: Modify the search term to 'payment' and press Enter
steps.expected: New search is performed and results for 'payment' are displayed

testCases.title: Virtual Agent Integration on Results Page
testCases.assumptions: User is on search results page.

steps.action: Type 'game pass' in the search box and press Enter

steps.expected: Virtual Agent summary section is visible with AI-generated response related to the search query
Virtual Agent chat interface opens for further assistance

testCases.title: Search with Long Text Input
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search bar is visible.

steps.action: Type a very long search query (200+ characters)
steps.expected: Search box accepts the input (may truncate if character limit exists)
Search is performed; results page loads without errors

testCases.title: Auto-Complete Suggestion Navigation with Keyboard
testCases.assumptions: User is on Xbox Support home page; search bar is visible.

steps.action: Press Down Arrow key to navigate suggestions
steps.expected: Focus moves through the auto-complete suggestions

steps.action: Press Enter on a highlighted suggestion
steps.expected: Selected suggestion is submitted and search results page loads
